glosses: to measure, to ascertain the quantity or size of a unit of material

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish اولچمك (ölçmek), from Proto-Turkic *ölč- (“to measure”); cognate with Azerbaijani ölçmək, Bashkir үлсәү (ülsəw), Chuvash виҫ (viś), Kazakh өлшеу (ölşeu), Kyrgyz өлчөө (ölcöö) and Uzbek oʻlchamoq
